results.title: The Shawshank Redemption
results.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

results.title: The Godfather
results.overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

results.title: The Dark Knight
results.overview: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

results.title: Schindler's List
results.overview: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.

results.title: Pulp Fiction
results.overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
results.overview: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

results.title: Forrest Gump
results.overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

results.title: Fight Club
results.overview: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

results.title: Inception
results.overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

results.title: The Matrix
results.overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

results.title: Goodfellas
results.overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
results.overview: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

results.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
results.overview: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda.

results.title: Interstellar
results.overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

results.title: City of God
results.overview: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

results.title: Spirited Away
results.overview: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

results.title: Saving Private Ryan
results.overview: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

results.title: Parasite
results.overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

results.title: Life Is Beautiful
results.overview: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

results.title: The Green Mile
results.overview: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
